ygData.subject: Re: need help getting eq to run...
ygData.msgSnippet: When I first started playing I was having a lot of trouble connecting. I would go link dead and then not be able to get back on. I would also lose sound and it
ygData.messageBody:
When I first started playing I was having a lot
of trouble connecting. I would go link dead and then
not be able to get back on. I would also lose sound
and it wouldnt come back until i backed out
completely. If it wouldnt let me back on i had to back out,
disconnect from my isp, reconnect and then i could get back
on. I went to my local computer store and bought a
$40.00 sound blaster modem and never had a problem
again. I have since switched to cable modem, it rocks!!
Hope you solve the problem. I am on the Erollisi Marr
server, look me up sometime.<br><br>Kanjien<br>lvl 19
Wood Elf Ranger<br>(Woohoo, found the GM drop ranger
choker this weekend in Everfrost event!!)<br><br>Uinan
D'Mortuus<br>lvl 25 Dark Elf SK
